name: chile
content:

A2 [ C or U ] (UK chilli , US also chili) the small red or green seed case from particular types of pepper plant that is used to make some foods spicy: I use chopped mild green chiles. Breakfast was scrambled egg with red chile. chile sauce/oil
More examplesFewer examplesAdobo is a thick, vinegary sauce with chipotle chiles.I usually wear plastic gloves when preparing raw chiles.In Italy, small but powerful chiles called peperoncini are added to olive oil to make a spicy condiment.Season with salt, pepper, and chile flakes to taste.
